block.p: Kathryn Sutton Golden, a daughter of Maureen and James Golden of Decatur, Ga., was married there yesterday to Mark Joseph Jerzy Nowakowski, a son of Maja and Jerzy Nowakowski of Port Washington, N.Y. The Rev. Frank Richardson performed the ceremony at St. Thomas More Roman Catholic Church.
The bride, 27, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a freelance production coordinator in New York for television commercials and music videos. She graduated from Auburn University.

Kathryn Sutton Golden, a daughter of Maureen and James Golden of Decatur, Ga., was married there yesterday to Mark Joseph Jerzy Nowakowski, a son of Maja and Jerzy Nowakowski of Port Washington, N.Y. The Rev. Frank Richardson performed the ceremony at St. Thomas More Roman Catholic Church.
The bride, 27, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a freelance production coordinator in New York for television commercials and music videos. She graduated from Auburn University.

The bridegroom, 26, is an associate for portfolio strategy and risk control at Lazard Asset Management in New York. He graduated cum laude from Harvard and was a Fulbright fellow in mathematics at the University of Warsaw in 1995 and 1996.
